job.name: ServiceNow_Retrieve_Records

variable.description: Base URL of the ServiceNow server.
variable.name: SERVICENOW_BASE_URL

job.description: A workflow that runs a REST GET request to retrieve multiple records from a ServiceNow table

task.name: Retrieve_Records
task.description: Executes a GET to retrieve multiple record from a ServiceNow table

variable.description: Name of table to retrieve records from.
variable.name: TABLE_NAME

variable.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return in the response (default to all fields).
variable.name: SYSPARM_FIELDS

variable.description: The maximum number of results returned per page.
variable.name: SYSPARM_LIMIT

variable.description: If true, disable SSL certificate verification.
variable.name: SSL_DISABLE_CHECK

variable.description: If true, print the full request and response content in the task output.
variable.name: DEBUG

variable.description: Which data to extract in the response if json, xml or html format is selected. It uses the GPath notation.
variable.name: RESPONSE_PATH

variable.description: An encoded query string used to filter the results.
variable.name: SYSPARM_QUERY

variable.description: Return field display values (true), actual values (false), or both (all).
variable.name: SYSPARM_DISPLAY_VALUE

variable.description: Do not execute a select count(*) on table.
variable.name: SYSPARM_NO_COUNT

variable.description: True to access data across domains if authorized.
variable.name: SYSPARM_QUERY_NO_DOMAIN

variable.description: True to exclude Table API links for reference fields.
variable.name: SYSPARM_EXCLUDE_REFERENCE_LINK
